modName: Turn all dogs into either foxes or wolves
descriptionHtml:
Turn all dogs into foxes or wolves

Simply place the meshes and texture folders you want into the data folder where you installed skyrim

This is a simple mesh/texture swap that turns all dogs either into wolves or foxes I also added the files I extracted to make the texture swap. Just rename the desired texture to the dog texture if you want a different wolf color. 

I suggest you pull up the console and type \"setessential 009A7AA\" to make Vigilance immortal. He will still get knocked out though so you need to heal him if you want him to continue tanking.
author: Sepht
